author: ralexstokes
content:
i wouldn't really think about mapping "nodes" to a "shard" -- better to think about: how many validators are attesting to the validity of a state transition?

if we had a sharded execution world then you would see something like a subset of all validators attesting to the shard transition

so the security of that transition would be limited by a majority of the validators in that subset

(presuming you don't have any kind of fault proofs)
